author: IGN
description:
Watch the unsettling Captured 2 announcement trailer for the upcoming anomaly horror game sequel with a survival horror twist. Escape an endless hallway by capturing anomalies on camera and surviving deadly entities. Captured 2 will be available on Steam.

Emily, a teenage girl who goes missing during a series of unexplained disappearances, finds herself trapped in an endless hallway within her own apartment, slowly losing her memory. Strange anomalies begin to appear, and by capturing them, she catches glimpses of her forgotten past.
title: Captured 2 - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Explore, navigate, and discover the vast wilderness in "Over the Hill," the latest game from the creator of "Art of Rally." Journey through diverse biomes inspired by real-world locations, ranging from valleys to mountains and everything in between. Drive iconic vehicles from the 60s to 80s, either solo or with friends, as you tackle challenging trails and take in beautiful scenery. 
Head over to Steam and add "over the hill" to your wishlist now!

#OverTheHill #Gaming #IGN
title: over the hill - Official Gameplay Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'The Jump' Featurette for Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts, the next film installment to the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. Take a look at the latest featurette that details the process behind Florence Pugh going to the second tallest building in the world for the film.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts. Will this dysfunctional group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and unite as something much more before it’s too late?

Jake Schreier directs Thunderbolts and Kevin Feige is the producer. Louis D’Esposito, Brian Chapek and Jason Tamez serve as executive producers. The screenplay was written by Eric Pea
title: Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts - Official 'The Jump' Featurette (2025) Florence Pugh

author: IGN
description:
Check out the PS5 Features Trailer for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, a first-person action-adventure game developed by MachineGames. Players will be able to experience this globe-trotting adventure as Indiana Jones with new enhanced features for PS5 including PS5 Pro support, ray-traced global illumination, 60 FPS support, fast-loading times, haptic feedback, adaptive trigger support, and more. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle launches on PlayStation 5 (PS5) on April 17 with the early-access window starting on April 15 with the Premium Edition.

#IndianaJonesAndTheGreatCircle #PS5 #Gaming
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Official PS5 Features Trailer

author: IGN
title: As we prep for Season 2 of Andor, here are some Easter eggs from Season 1. Presented by Andor

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement Trailer for Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade, the first installment in the Final Fantasy 7 Remake action RPG trilogy developed by Square Enix. Players can become acquainted with the legendary game and meet Cloud and Company on the first part of a large journey to defeat Sephiroth. Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 at a later date.

#FinalFantasy7RemakeIntergrade #NintendoSwitch2 #Gaming
title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Baldur's Gate 3's final update is coming to Xbox, PlayStation, and PC on April 15, 2025. Besides general improvements and bug fixes, Patch 8 has a lot in store for players, including long-awaited features like cross-play, photo mode, and 12 new subclasses. As Larian wraps up BG3 to focus on next projects, they leave fans with a final update to explore Faerûn with friends. Here's everything you need to know about Patch 8 in Baldur's Gate 3.

0:00 Intro
0:39 Cross-Play
2:50 Photo Mode
4:17 New Subclasses
8:08 Outro

For more on Baldur's Gate 3, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/baldurs-gate-3/
title: Baldur's Gate 3 - Biggest Changes in Patch 8

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Teaser Trailer for the Adventure Time collaboration in Fortnite, the hit battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Soon the loveable characters of the iconic TV show Adventure Time will join the Battle Bus with Jake the Dog, Finn the Human, Princess Bubblegum, and Marceline the Vampire joining the battle. The Fortnite X Adventure Time collaboration is coming soon.

#Fortnite #AdventureTime #Gaming
title: Fortnite X Adventure Time - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Meet the creatures of Forest Floor in this announcement trailer for the upcoming Pikmin-inspired game that blends 3D platforming with a biological ecosystem focus. In Forest Floor, lead your growing colony of mushkin as you explore the Forest Floor! Command your fungal followers to battle hostile creatures and gather vital resources across a variety of biomes. Run, jump, glide, and slide as you navigate diverse ecosystems. Discover symbiotic bonds with other creatures, unlocking new ways to gather, process resources, and traverse the world. Forest Floor will be available on PC.
title: Forest Floor - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: The captivating series stars Shazad Latif (Black Mirror) as the iconic Captain Nemo: an Indian Prince robbed of his birthright and family, a prisoner of the East India Mercantile Company, and a man bent on revenge against the forces that have taken everything from him. The series also stars Georgia Flood (Apples Never Fall) as Humility Lucas, Céline Menville (Emily in Paris) as Loti, and Thierry Fremont (Liaison) as Benoit, with guest appearances from Richard E. Grant, Anna Torv, and Noah Taylor.
title: Nautilus - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Shazad Latif, Georgia Flood

author: IGN
description:
One year after her sister Melanie mysteriously disappeared, Clover and her friends head into the remote valley where she vanished in search of answers. Exploring an abandoned visitor center, they find themselves stalked by a masked killer and horrifically murdered one by one…only to wake up and find themselves back at the beginning of the same evening. 

Trapped in the valley, they’re forced to relive the night again and again - only each time the killer threat is different, each more terrifying than the last. Hope dwindling, the group soon realizes they have a limited number of deaths left, and the only way to escape is to survive until dawn. 

Directed by David F. Sandberg, Until Dawn opens in theaters April 25, 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: Until Dawn - Exclusive Clip (2025) Ella Rubin, Odessa A’zion

author: IGN
description:
Watch the PS5 Launch Trailer for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, an action-adventure first-person game developed by MachineGames. Players will venture out on a globe-trotting journey as the great Indiana Jones to solve another mystery, defeat enemies, and survive dangerous traps. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is launching on April 17 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) with an early access period starting on April 15 for the Premium Edition alongside the game being available now on Xbox Series X|S and PC.

#IndianaJonesAndTheGreatCircle #PS5 #Gaming
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Official PS5 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out over 8 minutes of gameplay from Lunar 2, an RPG available as part of the upcoming Lunar Remastered Collection. Hiro and his friends embark on a journey in search of Maria, the mayor's daughter, who had gone missing in Zulan. The Missing Link, a beast-like creature, is the last enemy they encounter before finally finding Maria.

The Lunar Remastered Collection features Lunar: Sliver Star Story Complete and its sequel, Lunar 2: Eternal Blue Complete. Lunar Remastered Collection will be available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) on April 18, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lunar Remastered Collection - Official Lunar 2: Missing Link Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out 7 minutes of gameplay from Lunar 1, an RPG available as part of the upcoming Lunar Remastered Collection. Alex and Luna enter the Cave of Trials, an entrance exam they must go through before traveling to Vane. There, they encounter the Truffle Troubler—a vicious, mushroom-like enemy. 

The Lunar Remastered Collection features Lunar: Sliver Star Story Complete and its sequel, Lunar 2: Eternal Blue Complete. Lunar Remastered Collection will be available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) on April 18, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lunar Remastered Collection - Official Lunar 1: Truffle Troubler Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the new SEGA Genesis games added to the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack service for the Nintendo Switch. As a part of the April 2025 Game Updates, players will have access to Streets of Rage, ESWAT: City Under Siege, and Super Thunder Blade all with their Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscription. These classic SEGA Genesis games are available now for Nintendo Switch through the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack service.

#NintendoSwitchOnline #SEGAGenesis #IGN
title: Nintendo Switch Online: SEGA Genesis - Official April 2025 Game Updates Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from NVC 756, Logan fields the panel’s questions about his hands-on time with Switch 2, Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza, and Metroid Prime 4: Beyond. 

This weeks show is Logan Plant, Jada Griffin, Seth Macy, Rebekah Valentine, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#NintendoSwitch2 #Preorders #IGN
title: Preorder and Price Drama Aside, the Nintendo Switch 2 Itself Is Incredibly Promising - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! Ryan and Max are back as they discuss what the Nintendo Switch 2 Pricing means for the eventual PlayStation 6 and next Xbox. Can any console going forward reach the same success as the original Switch? And for handheld gaming PC's and the Xbox handheld, can we expect those to cost $450+, just like the Switch 2? Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

And if you're in Los Angeles the weekend of June 7-8, join us as IGN Live makes its return! We had a great time putting on a multi-day live show for all the fans last year, so we're doing it again. Special Early Bird ticket pricing is available: $15 for single-day general admisson, and $30 for single-day VIP. Check out IGN.com/Live for details.

#IGN #Gaming
title: What Does Switch 2 Mean for PS6, Xbox? - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: He’s going to be the greatest samurai in Japan! Get ready to follow Yaiba on his quest to be a real samurai in this new anime series from the creator of Case Closed and WIT Studio! YAIBA: Samurai Legend streaming now on Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+!
title: YAIBA: Samurai Legend - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Jan Dolski was a simple worker until a certain space mission program tempted him to take the risk of a lifetime. Or rather, many lifetimes. When the mission goes awry, he and the players will soon discover that survival depends on creating alternate versions of Jan. These versions are identical in form, share some memories, but possess different skills and emotions. And in this fight for survival, the survival have never been more personal. 
Alters will be available on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC on June 13, 2025.
title: The Alters - Official Release Date Trailer
